data.title: Douglas Lockard Jr. & Dawn Gannon
data.text:
MARRIED

Douglas Arthur Lockard Jr., and Dawn Marie Gannon were united in marriage in a 2 p.m. ceremony Saturday, July 16, 2005, at Christ Hamilton Church in Cherry Valley.

The Rev. Andrew Gannon, the bride's uncle, performed the ceremony in which the bride was given in marriage by her father. She is the daughter of Arlett D. Gannon II of East Stroudsburg and Marie Gannon of Stroudsburg.

The groom is the son of Douglas Sr. and Sandra Lockard of East Stroudsburg.

Louise Santoro of Pittsburgh was maid of honor. Bridesmaids were Bridget Campbell of East Stroudsburg, sister of the groom; Ashley Curcio of South Carolina; and Sara Gannon of East Stroudsburg, sister of the bride. Flowergirl was Sarah Campbell, niece of the groom and daughter of Henry and Bridget Campbell.

Shaun Regan of Stroudsburg was best man. Ushers were Eddie Giroux, Patrick Giroux and Douglas Lockard Sr., all of East Stroudsburg. Ringbearer was Brian Campbell, nephew of the groom and son of Henry and Bridget Campbell.

A reception was held at Peppe's Restaurant in East Stroudsburg, after which the couple took a wedding trip to Mexico.

The couple live in East Stroudsburg.

The bride is a graduate of Stroudsburg High School and attends Northampton Community College, pursuing a degree in dental hygiene. She is employed by Dr. Robert Nonnemacher, Stroudsburg.

The groom is a graduate of East Stroudsburg High School and attends Lackawanna Police Academy. He is employed by Superior Pool Products in Mount Olive, N.J.
